util_client package¶

Submodules¶

util_client.post_json module¶

Post a JSON string to the server.

util_client.post_json.post_json_string(api_call, connection_data, data='')[source]¶

Prototype for sending a post request with error handling and so on.

util_client.print_function_usage module¶

This module contains a function to reformat long strings.

util_client.print_function_usage.print_help(help_text)[source]¶

A small helper function that prints out a help string in a nice format.

Args:
help_text (str): The ‘unformated’ help string.
Returns:
None: Nothing.

I think this can be done waaay more elegant…

util_client.test_host module¶

Check the target host.

util_client.test_host.target_online_and_compatible(c_data, version_dict)[source]¶

Check whether or not we are dealing with a compatible server that is online.
